sentence: I am proud of my service and will not resign.pic.twitter.com/EP1vHWATp4 — Dr. Mehmet Oz (@Dr. Mehmet Oz) 1648071503 A recent Fox News poll shows Oz trailing David McCormick in the Republican primary, 24-15 percent, after having enjoyed a lead in the race shortly after announcing his candidacy.
